title: Config and Connection-Tab not visible when moving to secondary Monitor
author: HondaBey
body_snippet:
When moving the tabs Config or Connections to a secondary Display (to have fullscreen for Remote-Desktops), the are not visible anymore after resart the machine.

## Expected Behavior
Show config tabs at the position when it was closed the last time

## Current Behavior
No possibiltiy to bring back the config tab or the connections tab. Even when i deactivate and reactivate them by main View-Menu.
Reinstallation of application is necessary
